climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Premium Memory Foam】★Our office chair seat cushion is made of 100% pure memory foam, soft and firm, uses your own body heat to adapt to your curves, ergonomic "U" shaped hollow design for superior comfort, effectively support the coccyx, relieve the hip pressure caused by sitting for long periods.

【Convenience】★Non-slip rubber bottom keeps the butt pillow in place even when moving on the seat. The machine washable zippered breathable cover is easy to clean, just remove the cover and toss in the washing machine. Built-in handle for easy transport.

【Multiple Uses】★The chair pads supports the recovery of spinal problems such as lower back problems, disc herniation, coccyx injury, sciatica, etc. Large size (18.11''x14.17''x3.15'') fits all types of chairs, great for office, home desk chairs, car seats, gaming chairs, mobility scooter, automotive seat, wheelchairs. Also suitable for travel, sporting events, or pregnancy.

【Material Safety】★All parts of the seat cushion are certified safe and harmless for human health with no additives. The premium memory foam of this seat cushion quickly rebounds and returns to its original shape after each use and can be used to add height to any seat.
【Amazing Gift】★A amazing birthday or Christmas gift for family, friends and pregnant women. Relieve sciatica, arthritis, lower back, buttocks, spine, post-operative injuries or pregnancy pain relief.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BREATHABLE FABRIC The cover of this seat cushion allows for greater ventilation to reduce sweating. MEMORY FOAM Memory foam can sense the memory curve of the human body, reduce the pressure on the tailbone, and promote healthy posture. ANTI-SLIP BOTTOM The bottom is made of non-slip rubber so that the cushion will not slide easily when in use.

MACHINE WASHABLE The cover of the seat cushion can be machine washed to keep it clean. PORTABLE Built-in handle, reinforced sewing, you can move the cushion at will. ZIPPER High-quality zipper is very smooth, allowing you to easily open the cover.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feel so good on my back
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is awesome, helps your low back and legs when you have to sit at your job all day! Such a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m using it for my recliner and seems to be working great. It’s very comfortable and sturdy. I like the thickness of it and goes back to original firmness fairly quick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my computer chair because the chair i have was hurting my behind if i sat too long. Was looking for a little more cushion. This does pretty good. The only thing I don't like is that you kind of need to line up with it every time. You can't just plop yourself down whenever. Plus after a while it does flatten out the way you're sitting and the memory foam doesn't quite go back to where it was to 'recalibrate' unless you get up and let it puff back out. Overall it's comfortable and works, but it's annoying. Might look for something more solid next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Yes -- buy THIS one!
reviews.reviewText: Have tried various similar products, they all deflate with use and are not long-wearing. I have to sit at computer for literally 8+ hours with very few breaks, and this is a life saver. Very comfortable, fits well in chair -- I got the XL size (measured chair which is a big wooden kitchen chair that I'm using in my home office). Thickness is good, cutout for sacrum is excellent, VERY happy with purchasae.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lumbar and Cervical damage COMFORT
reviews.reviewText: I've tried a number of these. I've unfortunately been in two car accidents in the last ten years (both times I was stopped at a light and struck from behind) and they caused back and neck injury. I've not been able to sit comfortably since and really need the extra support when sitting for a long time. I have cervical cushions from medical supply stores and this is by far the best one I tried. For me this really gave a cradle for my tailbone and the suspension gave relief to my spine. My posture was better because I wasn't actually sitting on the coccyx and I was able to work for an extended period without having to shift or adjust my position. I think the raised curve in the front also helps tilt your pelvis at the correct angle and I like the non-slip bottom because when I did wriggle/adjust my seat it didn't slide around underneath me. Some older ones I have will be replaced by this as I like to use one at my desk, another in my car, etc. It's lightweight enough to carry/move but I prefer not having to bring it in and out every time I want to use it. There's tons of these out there and I've only tried about five different ones from Amazon this one is my favorite and I will be ordering another one! (Maybe two)!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Put it in our spare office chair so it’s not like we sit on it constantly, after a hour or so it’s just flat and it’s not comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My butt is happy!
reviews.reviewText: Super comfortable!! Great price!! I would definitely purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I sit for long periods of time at work which causes me pain. This cushion is the perfect size for my office chair and gives me just enough support to work comfortably.

Me encantó el producto, llegó súper a tiempo, bien empacado. Tiene la firmeza y suavidad necesaria para pasar varias horas sentado, su tamaño fue perfecto para mi silla, fácil de lavar la funda y no ha perdido su forma, en excelentes condiciones luego de 3 meses de uso
Bought for help with sciatic pain but it actually makes it worse. Very firm and Not overly comfortable.
